basics.name: Md. Latiful Kabir
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Full-stack Software Engineer with extensive experience in modern web technologies, including JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Bun.js, Express, Elysia.js, Python, and GraphQL. I specialize in creating scalable applications using frameworks such as React, Next.js, Astro, Vue.js, and Node.js, combined with UI libraries including Tailwind CSS, ShadCN, Daisy UI, Material UI, and Chakra UI. My expertise encompasses authentication systems (Clerk, JWT, OAuth, Google Auth), database management (MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL), and ORM tools (Drizzle, Mongoose, Prisma). I have hands-on experience with cloud platforms, containerization (Docker), and version control systems. Starting my journey with C and Java, I continue to expand my skillset with Rust and Go. My passion lies in building efficient, user-centric solutions that address real-world challenges.

education.studyType: B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering (CSE)

work.name: Affpilot AI
work.summary: Affpilot AI is an AI-powered content creation tool designed for bloggers and marketers to automate the generation of SEO-optimized articles, product reviews, and other content. Key features include bulk article generation (up to 1,000 articles in one click), auto-posting capabilities for WordPress and Blogger, and advanced SEO tools for keyword research and grouping. The platform offers specialized generators for various content types, such as Amazon review articles, biography articles, comparison articles, and informational articles. It also provides tools for content optimization like paragraph rewriting, sentence correction, and FAQ generation.
highlights: Spearheading development of the Affpilot AI platform â€” an AI-powered content automation system with over 90,000+ global users.
Leading front-end initiatives using React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring seamless scalability and performance.
Built interactive dashboards for bulk content generation, SEO automation, and one-click publishing to WordPress/Blogger.
Integrated RESTful APIs for content generation, keyword analysis, and real-time job tracking.
Collaborated cross-functionally for the AppSumo global launch, enhancing onboarding flow and multilingual UI/UX.
Improved code modularity and component reusability, reducing front-end code redundancy by 25%.

work.name: AdsPillar (PlanPost AI)
work.summary: PlanPost AI is an AI marketing assistant that helps users create content, ads, and manage SEO. It offers features such as generating 30 days of social media posts, ad copy, graphics, and videos in seconds. Key functionalities include a bulk social media post generator, a free online graphic design tool, an AI ad creative generator, and an AI agent chatbot for customer engagement. The platform aims to save time, reduce costs, and help businesses grow faster by streamlining content creation and ad campaign management.
highlights: Contributed to PlanPost AI, an AI-driven social media content creation and scheduling platform.
Developed backend APIs with Python (FastAPI) and crafted responsive UIs using React.js.
Designed and launched Canvas, a manual graphics design tool inspired by Figma/Canva.
Integrated AI-assisted media rendering workflows and implemented scalable client-server communication models.
Enhanced backend performance, reducing API latency by 40%.

work.name: AdsPillar
work.summary: Supported full-stack development of internal projects using React.js, Node.js, and Python. Participated in Agile sprints, performed debugging, and contributed to QA testing pipelines. Assisted in integrating third-party APIs and improving code efficiency through refactoring.
highlights: Supported full-stack development of internal projects using React.js, Node.js, and Python.
Participated in Agile sprints, performed debugging, and contributed to QA testing pipelines.
Assisted in integrating third-party APIs and improving code efficiency through refactoring.
